sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Commission to End Hunger Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Commission to End Hunger Act.

sections.heading: Legislative findings. It is the goal of the State of Illinois that no man, woman, or child should ever be faced with hunger.
sections.text: Legislative findings. It is the goal of the State of Illinois that no man, woman, or child should ever be faced with hunger.

sections.text: Members. The Commission to End Hunger shall be composed of no more than 21 voting members including 2 members of the Illinois House of Representatives, one appointed by the Speaker of the House and one appointed by the House Minority Leader; 2 members of the Illinois Senate, one appointed by the Senate President and one appointed by the Senate Minority Leader; one representative of the Office of the Governor appointed by the Governor; one representative of the Office of the Lieutenant Governor appointed by the Lieutenant Governor; and 15 public members, who shall be appointed by the Governor.

sections.heading: Meetings and reports. The full Commission shall meet at least twice annually. The Steering Committee shall meet at least quarterly.
sections.text: Meetings and reports. The full Commission shall meet at least twice annually. The Steering Committee shall meet at least quarterly.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
